section.title: Next steps
section.paragraph: Your OpenStack environment now includes the dashboard.
After you install and configure the dashboard, you can complete the following tasks:

list_item.paragraph: Provide users with a public IP address, a username, and a password so they can access the dashboard through a web browser. In case of any SSL certificate connection problems, point the server IP address to a domain name, and give users access.
Customize your dashboard. For details, see Customize and configure the Dashboard.
Set up session storage. For derails, see Set up session storage for the Dashboard.
To use the VNC client with the dashboard, the browser must support HTML5 Canvas and HTML5 WebSockets.
For details about browsers that support noVNC, see README and browser support.
